content: The quota of paid users is almost exhausted.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display an alert message when the quota of paid users is almost exhausted, prompting a warning or action in the UI. It appears in a dialog component to inform the user about their subscription level status.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "تم استنفاد حصة المستخدمين المدفوعين تقريبًا." literally translates to 'The quota of paid users has almost been exhausted'. While understandable, a more natural and idiomatic Arabic phrasing for 'almost exhausted' would be closer to 'تقريبا منتهية' (taqriban muntahiya) or 'على وشك الانتهاء' (ala washk al-intiha').  'استنفاد' implies complete exhaustion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تم تقليل حصة المستخدمين المدفوعين تقريبًا.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Maksettujen käyttäjien määrän kiintiö on melkein täysi' is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Finnish. 'Määrän' (quantity/number of) is slightly awkward here. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maksettujen käyttäjien kiintiö on melkein täysi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation focuses on "storage capacity" (ストレージ容量) instead of directly conveying the concept of a quota being almost exhausted. While storage capacity could be implied by a quota, it's not the primary meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 有料ユーザーの利用枠が残りわずかです。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ກໍານົດຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຈ່າຍແລ້ວເກືອບໝົດແລ້ວ' translates more literally as 'The number of paid users is almost finished.' This doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'quota almost exhausted'. A better translation would convey the concept of a limit being reached.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ກໍານົດຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຈ່າຍແລ້ວເກືອບເຕັມແລ້ວ' (The quota of paid users is almost full) or 'ກໍານົດຈຳນວນຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຈ່າຍແລ້ວເກືອບໝົດສິດໃຊ້ງານແລ້ວ' (The quota of paid users is almost out of usage rights).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Het aantal betaalde gebruikers is bijna opgebruikt" is understandable, it's not the most natural or accurate translation of "The quota of paid users is almost exhausted."  'Quota' has a specific meaning that isn't fully captured by 'opgebruikt'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like: "De betaalde gebruikersquota is bijna bereikt." or "De beschikbare betaalde gebruikersquota is bijna opgebruikt." or "De capaciteit voor betaalde gebruikers is bijna bereikt."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Cota spațiului de stocare pentru utilizatorii cu plată aproape epuizată" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "The quota of paid users is almost exhausted." The term 'spațiului de stocare' (storage space) is not directly related to the quota mentioned in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota pentru utilizatorii plătitori este aproape epuizată.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "අවලංගු ගෙවුම් පරිශීලකයින්ගේ ප්‍රමාණය ඉක්මවා යාමට ආසන්නය." is not an accurate translation of "The quota of paid users is almost exhausted." It implies that the number of paid users is about to exceed a limit, rather than the quota being almost used up. A more accurate translation would focus on the quota itself being depleted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A possible suggestion would be something like "ගෙවන ලද පරිශීලකයින්ගේ කොට්ටාව ඉක්මවන්නට ආසන්නය" (Gewa nada parishilakayin kotia ikmavannata asannaya) which translates to "The quota of paid users is close to being exhausted".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Gần như đã dùng hết hạn mức người dùng trả phí' is a bit literal and doesn't flow as naturally in Vietnamese. 'Hạn mức' can sound formal and potentially confusing in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like: 'Số lượng người dùng trả phí sắp đạt giới hạn' or 'Số lượng người dùng trả phí sắp tối đa.'
